import { type FC } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' export interface ModalProps { onClose: () => void onActionBtnClick: () => void cardId: string | null } const Modal: FC = ({ cardId, onClose, onActionBtnClick }) => { return ReactDOM.createPortal(

Card Information

Card ID:

{cardId}

{/* Add other card information here */}
, document.getElementById('modal-root')! ) } export default Modal
